sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './ResultsBox.scss' const ResultsBox = ({ playerData, matches }) => { return (

{playerData.name}

Level: {playerData.summonerLevel}

{matches.length !== 0 ? matches.map((match, index) => { const participantIndex = match.metadata.participants.indexOf(playerData.puuid) const participant = match.info.participants[participantIndex] const participantTeam = participant.teamId const teaminfo = match.info.teams const teamIndex = teaminfo.findIndex(e => e.teamId === participantTeam) console.log(match) console.log(participantTeam) console.log('myTeam', teaminfo[teamIndex].win) return(
{match.info.gameMode} â€“ {teaminfo[teamIndex].win ? 'Victory' : 'Defeat'}

{participant.championName}

{participant.kills}/{participant.deaths}/{participant.assists}

KDA: {Math.round(((participant.kills + participant.assists)/participant.deaths) + 'e2' + 'e-2')}

// [{a:1, b:2},{a:3, b:4}] ) }) :

no info

}
) } export default ResultsBox
